title: At UBS A Machine Knows What Clients Want
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

UBS is launching one online service after another in Switzerland, with a system discreetly analyzing customer behavior in the background. Now, its digital efforts are themselves under scrutiny. New digital offerings every quarter is what Sabine Magri, chief operating officer (COO) of UBS’s Swiss business, promised in May when UBS launched its purely digital product […]

The post At UBS A Machine Knows What Clients Want appeared first on Retail News Asia.
